I would strongly recommend Dr tejeswini for complete treatment if your a diabetic. * **** *** ** *** *********

No complaint from doctor. But there was a long wait time. My appointment was at 12:30 but we got chance to meet the doctor after 1:30p.m.

As far as doctor is concerned - she is very nice and patient. She gave full time and suggested appropriate course of actions.
On lighter note: first doctor whose handwriting a common man can read! :)

Doctor showed up really late and I had to wait for a longer time. Even though I selected the first available slot, another patient was allowed to go before me. Dear team,

It's been more than an hour, I am waiting for a meeting with doctor.

It seems it's first come first serve , no benefits of booking it through practo. It's frustrating and top of that they are asking me extra money for registration. I am highly disappointed with practo. You should have made it clear in the beginning itself that they goona charge extra fees which is of no use to me in future.
Though they have made bill at 6:36 but my consultation has not started yet. They are very clever and so as practo. 

Request you to look into this.I waited till 7:10 my appointment was at 5:40

review: visited Dr Tejaswini for my wife's thyroid problem (hypothyroidism).  Doctor is very polite and listens to you very patiently.  Explains the health issue very clearly.  Doesn't prescribe unnecessary tests and medicines and no unnecessary followups.  She prescribed medicines and asked us to come back only after an year or if we face any problems.  With the medicines she prescribed, my wife's thyroid level is absolutely optimum.  Thank you doctor.
